question: Which of the following statements is an incorrect statement about Antarctic Circle?
option1: The Sun is visible at local midnight and not visible at local noon at least once a year within the Circle
option2: The position of the Circle is not fixed and it fluctuates due to tidal forces
option3: Days and nights can never be longer than 24 hours inside the Circle
option4: There is no permanent human population south of the Antarctic Circle
answer: Days and nights can never be longer than 24 hours inside the Circle
explanation: Third statement is an incorrect statement because days and nights can be longer than 24 hours inside the Circle. The polar night occurs when the night lasts for more than 24 hours and polar day occurs when day lasts for more than 24 hours.
